mapper.sql: id, user_id, car_id, d_start, d_start_str, d_end, d_end_str, d_count, d_date, d_price, d_remark, d_status, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into driver_record (id, user_id, car_id, d_start, d_start_str, d_end, d_end_str, d_count, d_date, d_price, d_remark, d_status, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update driver_record
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
d_start = #{dStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_start_str = #{dStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_end = #{dEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_end_str = #{dEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_count = #{dCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
d_date = #{dDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
d_price = #{dPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
d_remark = #{dRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_status = #{dStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update driver_record set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_start = #{dStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_start_str = #{dStartStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_end = #{dEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_end_str = #{dEndStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_count = #{dCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_date = #{dDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, d_price = #{dPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, d_remark = #{dRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_status = #{dStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from driver_record t where t.d_start like CONCAT(#{d_start},'%') and t.d_end like CONCAT(#{d_end},'%') and str_to_date(from_unixtime(t.d_date),'%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(from_unixtime(#{runtime}),'%Y-%m-%d')
